questions.question: Where is Whidbey Island?
questions.answer: The island on which Will was born

questions.question: What are horror movies?
questions.answer: The genre of movies that Will loves to watch on his own

questions.question: Who is Olivia Rodrigo?
questions.answer: Will's Spotify Wrapped always includes this artist

questions.question: Where is Yokosuka?
questions.answer: The city in which James was born.

questions.question: What is the University of Minnesota?
questions.answer: James' alma mater

questions.question: What is the cello?
questions.answer: THe instrument James played for 8 years in grade school orchestra

questions.question: Where is Long Beach, CA?
questions.answer: The place James ran his first marathon.

questions.question: What is Just the End?
questions.answer: The name of James' punk rock band in high school

questions.question: What is Disney Land?
questions.answer: Will and James' favorite theme park.

questions.question: Where is Vancouver?
questions.answer: The first place Will and James traveled to as a couple.

questions.question: Where is Cancun?
questions.answer: THe Mexico vacation spot that Will and James loved.

questions.question: Where is Deception Pass (or Whidbey Island)?
questions.answer: The place James proposed to Will.

questions.question: Where is Hawaii?
questions.answer: Their next vacation spot.

questions.question: What is Star Wars?
questions.answer: James' favorite movies (hint: tattoo on his wrist).

questions.question: What is When We Were Young Fest?
questions.answer: The first music festival that Will and James attended together - in Las Vegas

questions.question: What is Kingdom Hearts?
questions.answer: Will’s favorite video game and the inspiration for his cosplay at Sakura Con in 2024.

questions.question: What is Attack on Titan?
questions.answer: Will and James’ favorite anime (after James finally convinced Will to watch it and he fell in love with it).

questions.question: Who is Genji?
questions.answer: The name of the bestest German Shepherd in the universe.

questions.question: What is Playa Vista?
questions.answer: The name of the city to which James and Will are moving.

questions.question: What is 3.5 years?
questions.answer: How long Will and James were together before getting engaged.
